required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of the Effect of PUR118 on Ozone Induced Airway Inflammation in Healthy Normal Volunteers
clinical_study.official_title: Single-blind Evaluation of the Effect of PUR118 on Ozone Induced Airway Inflammation in Healthy Normal Volunteers

brief_summary.textblock: This trial in healthy subjects will assess PUR118's effect on attenuating ozone induced airway inflammation. This trial will establish the tolerability of PUR118 in healthy normal volunteers.

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in sputum cell counts and inflammatory markers
Change from baseline in white blood cell and inflammatory biomarker counts in blood
primary_outcome.time_frame: 7 and 24 hours post-initiation of ozone challenge

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in pulmonary function
secondary_outcome.time_frame: all post-dose timepoints up to 24 hours post-initiation of ozone challenge

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in clinical signs and symptoms from physical examination at baseline
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Subjects will be followed for an expected average of 12 weeks

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in clinical safety laboratory tests from baseline
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Subjects will be followed for an expected average of 12 weeks

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in vital signs from baseline
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Subjects will be followed for an expected average of 12 weeks
Subjects will be followed for an expected average of 12 weeks

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of subjects with adverse events
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Subjects will be followed for an expected average of 12 weeks

facility.name: Fraunhofer Institut fur Toxicologie und Experimentelle Medicine (ITEM)
